name: Ninja Frogs Adventure (Heavy WIP)
description:
Greetings! This is an independent short adventure platformer I've been working on during my free time. It is  very much a work in progress, and uses free assets, and some of my own sounds. 

The game has no end, and will just loop the between the two stages for now.

CONTROLS: 
A/D to move

Space to jump/double jump/Wallkick

E pick up/throw

S + E place held object in front of you


Feedback is more than welcome!

Known problems:

Better ways to convey a tutorial

may be possible to get grabbable object caught in terrain. I think I have a check to cover all softlock spots, but I make no guarantees
